= `varPrintAfter` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [varPrintSyntax varPrint] > [varPrintAfterMethod varPrintAfter]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$varName* _String_
  Variable avaible in scope of type Array or Object.  $varName should NOT start with $.
